msbt.message: Are you ready? 'Cause the fireworks show starts tonight at 7 PM sharp.I think I might show up early to get a good seat. I need plenty of room to spread out my snacks, .
I'm so excited for tonight's show! Maybe even too excitedTime is moving sooo sloooow. I wish 7 PM would hurry up and get here already, .
Do you remember what day it is today? It's fireworks day! Yes!The show starts at 7 PM, and you won't want to miss it. Big sparkly things will be lighting up the sky!
The fireworks show is starting so soon! I hope it lives up to all the hype I've created, .
It's almost fireworks time! Picked out your seat yet, ?I'll sit next to you if you share your snacks, .
The fireworks are starting up soon, right? Perfect. I'm in just the right mood for a super-loud light show.
Those fireworks were so awesome, I feel like I'm still seeing stars!I'm also hearing a high-pitched ringing sound, but that's not so unusual, actually.
That was a life-changing fireworks experience. I couldn't tear my eyes away from the sky, . My neck still hurts from looking up for so long! A huh huh huh!
Whew! Time to go finish off the evening with a few post-fireworks nibblins. I'm starving after all that super intense staring up at the sky.
Aww So that was the very last fireworks show of the year, huh?I'll be counting down the minutes until they start up again One<10_4 /> I'm still on one, aren't I?

Nothing gets me amped up like a big fireworks-show finale, !Come on, let's go run a mile or cut down a tree, !Or better yetlet's stuff ourselves full of and then just nap it off. That sounds more like me.
Ah, the last fireworks show of the year. I can't believe it's already over.What a perfect time to sit back and reflect on how cool it is to see stuff explode in the sky
